# Achieve Pack - Sustainable Packaging Solutions

> Achieve Pack is a leading eco-friendly flexible packaging manufacturer, providing compostable, recyclable, and bio-based pouches with low MOQ starting from 100 pieces.

## Company Overview
- Founded: 2011
- Location: Shenzhen, China (Manufacturing) + Los Angeles, CA (US Office)
- Website: https://achievepack.com
- Industry: Flexible Packaging Manufacturing

## Core Products
1. **Stand Up Pouches** - Self-standing bags with bottom gusset
2. **Flat Bottom Bags** - Box-style pouches for premium display
3. **Spout Pouches** - Liquid packaging with reclosable spouts
4. **3 Side Seal Pouches** - Simple flat pouches
5. **Side Gusset Bags** - Traditional coffee bags

## Sustainable Materials
- **Compostable**: Home compostable (TUV OK Home), Industrial compostable (EN13432)
- **Recyclable Mono-PE/PP**: Single material for easy recycling
- **Bio-PE**: Sugarcane-based bioplastic (I'm Green)
- **PCR**: Post-Consumer Recycled content (30-100%)

## Key Differentiators
- Low MOQ: 100 pieces minimum order
- Digital Printing: No plate fees, fast turnaround
- Certified Eco-Materials: TUV, DIN, FSC certifications
- 70% Less Plastic: Compared to traditional packaging

## Industries Served
- Coffee & Tea
- Snacks & Food
- Pet Food & Treats
- Supplements & Powders
- Baby Food
- Frozen Food
- Sauces & Condiments

## Contact Information
- Email: info@achievepack.com

- WhatsApp: Available on website

## Certifications
- ISO 9001, ISO 14001
- FSC Certified
- TUV OK Home Compost
- DIN CERTCO
- BRC Packaging

## Pricing
- Samples: Starting from $35
- Digital Print Orders: Starting from $90 (100 pcs)
- Custom Orders: Request quote on website

## Online Store
https://achievepack.com/store
- Sample packs available
- Instant pricing calculator
- No minimum for samples
